name: Debug Man
description:
In this game, you play as Debug Man and you must shoot bugs off of a circuit board to fix a computer. To move, use the WASD keys and to aim the gun, just point the cursor in that direction and fire by left-clicking. 

Link to font used: https://www.1001fonts.com/karmatic-arcade-font.html

Disclaimer: I don't actually know anything about circuit boards, I just designed random stuff

Github Repository: https://github.com/CloudMonkeyCoding/Game-Off-2021-Submission-Debug-Man
